post:
Hello fellow readers. We are here to offer you a great deal on high quality VPS servers. We
give you friendly, personal customer support. We try to know you by name. Whatever it is, we will do our best to satisfy your needs. We are always willing to talk on the phone at any time.

We own all of our servers and other equipment. We are hosted in Cary, NC in one of Tierpoint's many data centers.

24/7 monitoring system, 24/7 Support

Feel free to ask any questions here or email us at sales@littlecreekhosting.com

All VPS's include the following:

Xen PV Technology
SolusVM Control Panel
Unlimited domains on all control panel options
FREE Setup
24/7 support
Full Root Access
DirectAdmin Control panel Included
Easy upgrade options


Operating Systems available:

CentOS
Ubuntu
Debian
Arch
Gentoo
Fedora
Scientific
More upon request.
